# Terms of Service

pnw-python-subscriptions
Last Updated: 2025
Author: Sumnor

## 1. Acceptance of Terms

By installing, importing, or using pnw-python-subscriptions (“the Software”), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, do not use the Software.

## 2. Description of the Software

pnw-python-subscriptions is an open-source Python utility designed to simplify handling and managing subscription data for Projects and APIs related to Politics & War (PNW) or similar services.

The Software is provided as-is, with no guarantees of availability, reliability, or fitness for any purpose.

## 3. License

This Software is distributed under the MIT License.
Users are free to use, modify, distribute, and publish derivative works as long as they comply with the terms of that license.

## 4. Allowed Use

You may use the Software for:

Personal or commercial projects

Integration into bots, scripts, tools, or automation

Creating derivative or extended versions

Educational or research purposes

## 5. Prohibited Use

You may not use the Software for:

Malicious automation, abuse, harassment, or wrongdoing

Attempts to exploit or harm third-party APIs

Violations of the Politics & War game rules or API ToS

Hosting or distributing malware

Misrepresenting the Software as your own (you must retain copyright notices)

## 6. No Warranty

The Software is provided “AS IS”, without warranty of any kind.
The author (Sumnor) is not liable for:

Data loss

API bans

Downtime

Errors resulting from misuse

Use at your own risk.

## 7. Updates

The author may update or change the Software at any time without notice.
Continued use after updates constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

## 8. Termination

The author reserves the right to refuse support or restrict use if the Software is abused or used in violation of these Terms.

## 9. Third-Party Services

If you connect the Software to any external services (including the PNW API), you are responsible for:

Following their Terms of Service

Avoiding rate-limit abuse

Secure API key handling

These Terms shall be governed by and interpreted under the laws applicable to the author’s jurisdiction unless required otherwise by local law.
